VOD.text:
Leaving the EU would probably see the return of roaming charges - looks like Vodafone jumped the gun! Sympathy for customers affected.
BBC News - Vodafone error sees customers hit by thousands in charges
This could be the norm if we crash out, forget roaming charges being the same as in the UK

Best ditch the rubbish. Funny how their mistakes only seem to benefit then. 
BBC News - Vodafone error sees customers hit by thousands in charges

DGE.text:
Coverage of the last ditch pay negotiations with Diageo today, and of the offer that will be put to our members in distilleries, cooperages, bottling halls and maturation sites across Scotland. 🥃

BBC News - Diageo strikes called off after new offer made
What do you drink when you're avoiding alcohol? That's our question today #BBCBizLive as Diageo buys into Seedlip drinks, the "distillers" of fancy non-alcoholic drinks.
BBC News - Whisky giant Diageo sued over 'angel’s share' fungus claims

TSCO.text: Ywan dull rugby ) Hemp oil from cannabis thats what olivia newton john is having and  hemp oil is £6 in tesco supermarket for 500ml so why are women paying hundreds of pounds for it ?

SN.text: Excessive focus on the division of the pie causes the entire pie to shrink: Smith & Nephew board cracks down on CEO pay, causing him to quit. Market value rose £4.6 billion under his tenure; his maximum pay opportunity was £4.6 million.
Artificial knee and hip maker Smith & Nephew upgrades full year revenue guidance
